svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/137.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="27.2.0"> <diagram name="Página-1" id="krIaLwXdareh_wUnVDSa"> <mxGraphModel dx="2037" dy="1061" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-1" value="E" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1428" y="372" width="330" height="426" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-2" value="Captura de Flujos
Se captura el audio del loopback
y el vídeo del framebuffer de Xvfb" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-1"> <mxGeometry x="43" y="46" width="260" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-3" value="Codificación con FFmpeg
Los flujos de audio y vídeo en bruto
se envían a FFmpeg" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-1"> <mxGeometry x="43" y="271" width="260" height="126" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-4" value="" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;endArrow=block;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;rounded=0;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" edge="1" parent="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-1" source="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-2" target="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-3"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-5" value="D" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1048" y="331" width="330" height="507" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-6" value="Inicia Entorno Gráfico Virtual (Xvfb)" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-5"> <mxGeometry x="43" y="46" width="260" height="78" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-7" value="Lanza Navegador Chrome Headless
dentro del escritorio virtual" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-5"> <mxGeometry x="43" y="199" width="260" height="102" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-8" value="Chrome renderiza la vista
compuesta de la conferencia" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-5"> <mxGeometry x="43" y="376" width="260" height="102" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-9" value="" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;endArrow=block;exitX=0.5;exitY=0.99;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;rounded=0;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" edge="1" parent="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-5" source="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-6" target="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-10" value="" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;endArrow=block;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;rounded=0;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" edge="1" parent="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-5" source="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-7" target="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-8"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-11" value="Inicio del Proceso
Jicofo (Gestor de Conferencias)
envía una señal a Jibri para iniciar la grabación" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="118" y="510" width="260" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-12" value="Autenticación
Jibri se autentica con el servidor
XMPP (Prosody) usando sus credenciales" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="428" y="510" width="260" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-13" value="Unión a la Conferencia
Jibri se une a la sala de conferencias
como un participante 'invisible'" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="738" y="510" width="260" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-14" value="Resultado Final
FFmpeg codifica y empaqueta
los flujos en un único
fichero 'video.mp4'" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1808" y="510" width="260" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-15" value="Almacenamiento
El fichero .mp4 se guarda
en el volumen persistente" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="2118" y="534" width="246" height="102" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-16" value="" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;endArrow=block;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;rounded=0;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-11" target="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-12"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-17" value="" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;endArrow=block;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;rounded=0;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-12" target="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-13"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-18" value="" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;endArrow=block;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;rounded=0;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-14" target="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-15"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-19" value="" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;endArrow=block;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;rounded=0;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-13" target="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-5"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-20" value="" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;endArrow=block;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;rounded=0;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-5" target="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-21" value="" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;endArrow=block;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;rounded=0;fillColor=#fad7ac;strokeColor=#b46504;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Zz0GiURT_F-Jb6LxLOq6-1" rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 215, 172), rgb(75, 45, 8)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 328px; height: 1px; padding-top: 49px; margin-left: 1312px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 215, 172), rgb(75, 45, 8)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 163px; margin-left: 1355px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Captura de Flujos
Se captura el audio del loopback
y el vídeo del framebuffer de Xvfb

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 215, 172), rgb(75, 45, 8)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 376px; margin-left: 1355px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Codificación con FFmpeg
Los flujos de audio y vídeo en bruto
se envían a FFmpeg

div.div:
Lanza Navegador Chrome Headless
dentro del escritorio virtual

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 215, 172), rgb(75, 45, 8)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 428px; margin-left: 975px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Chrome renderiza la vista
compuesta de la conferencia

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));
fill: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 215, 172), rgb(75, 45, 8)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 255px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Inicio del Proceso
Jicofo (Gestor de Conferencias)
envía una señal a Jibri para iniciar la grabación

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 215, 172), rgb(75, 45, 8)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 255px; margin-left: 312px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Autenticación
Jibri se autentica con el servidor
XMPP (Prosody) usando sus credenciales

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 215, 172), rgb(75, 45, 8)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 255px; margin-left: 622px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Unión a la Conferencia
Jibri se une a la sala de conferencias
como un participante 'invisible'

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 215, 172), rgb(75, 45, 8)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 255px; margin-left: 1692px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Resultado Final
FFmpeg codifica y empaqueta
los flujos en un único
fichero 'video.mp4'

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 215, 172), rgb(75, 45, 8)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(180, 101, 4), rgb(201, 133, 49));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 244px; height: 1px; padding-top: 255px; margin-left: 2002px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Almacenamiento
El fichero .mp4 se guarda
en el volumen persistente
